system.effect: When the character makes a Charge Action whilst using a Junp Pack, their melee attack deals an extra 1d10 damage per two degrees of success on the melee attack they make at the end of their charge. Max 2d10.

description.value: When the character makes a Charge Action whilst using a Junp Pack, their melee attack deals an extra 1d10 damage per two degrees of success on the melee attack they make at the end of their charge. Max 2d10.
